title: How do I make preseason intro stop showing up?
body: Every time I leave a game or log on, I get the preseason pop-up. How do I get it to stop?

replies.body:
This could be a setting or even connection issue that's failing to tell the server that you received the notification.  Start with a config reset to see if that fixes it for you:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xEwOTLMU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-18T22:11:53.890+0000)
>
> This could be a setting or even connection issue that's failing to tell the server that you received the notification.  Start with a config reset to see if that fixes it for you:
> 
> Log into the game client.
> Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
> Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
> Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

This didn't help - still getting the preseason popup on exiting every game. I've also since reinstalled the game (not a clean reinstall, though). Any other ideas or other information I could provide?
See also my above response to outcast5
Sorry the issue is still persisting here.  :(  I've created a ticket for you so our tech team can help you out.  Your ticket number is #32702329.  They'll reach out to you as soon as they can!
If you have your client in close client during game, the message will not stop, change it so it stays open and it should work.

> [{quoted}](name=outcast5,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xEwOTLMU,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-11-19T02:22:54.678+0000)
>
> If you have your client in close client during game, the message will not stop, change it so it stays open and it should work.

This made a difference - if I have it set to keep the client open, I don't get the pop-up on exiting a game. After switching back to allowing the client to close during a game, it pops back up at game end. So keeping the game client open reduces the impact, or perhaps eliminates - I don't get the pop-up on login. Perhaps it's a bug in the code that allows the game client to close and then re-open on game end?
